    ↓
    Set project scope: set_pkg()
    Create manager: __init__()
    Install hooks: install_hooks() [deploys CustomLoader]
    ↓
Runtime Phase (Sub-Group B & C)
    ↓
    Modules import → CustomLoader intercepts
    Cache synchronization: _clear_caches()
    Metadata recording: set_filepath(), set_version()
    ↓
Cleanup Phase (Sub-Group C)
    ↓
    Remove hooks: remove_hooks()
    Restore system state","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d1469604-7db5-413b-8ce1-c009aa18bb2b","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"bab10268-4759-4dc2-afc3-a3eb54f0f423","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key
